title: Community College Mt Gambier: growing
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - South Australia
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Art - Study and teaching
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community centers - South Australia
Crafts & Visual Arts/Art - Study and teaching
description: This is the story of the South East Community College Mount Gambier. Features two teachers, Bev Puckridge and Ian Winter, who narrate throughout the film. Shows how students go back to their own communities and set up and teach smaller groups in woodwork, pottery, spinning etc. Emphasis is made that art is a natural part of our world - a natural thing to do. It is not the finished product that really matters, but the thought process used to achieve it.
